#include "stdio.h"
#define PUTCHAR putchar_unlocked
inline int inp()
{
int noRead=0;
char p=getchar_unlocked();
for(;p<33;)
{
p=getchar_unlocked();
};
while(p>32)
{
noRead = (noRead << 3) + (noRead << 1) + (p - '0');
p=getchar_unlocked();
}
return noRead;
}

inline void out(int x)
{
if(x==-1)
{
PUTCHAR('-');
PUTCHAR('1');
PUTCHAR('\n');
}
else
{
int i = 10;
char buf[11];
// buf[10] = 0;
buf[10] = '\n';

do
{
buf[--i] = x % 10 + '0';
x/= 10;
}while(x);
do
{
PUTCHAR(buf[i]);
} while (buf[i++] != '\n');
}
}


int main()
{
	int n, q, i, a, b;
	n=inp();
	q=inp();
	int arr[n];
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		arr[i]=inp();
	while(q--)
	{
		int ar[10001]={0},c=0;
		a=inp(),b=inp();
		for(i=a-1;i<b;i++)
		{
			if(ar[arr[i]]==0)
			{
				ar[arr[i]]=1;
				c++;
			}
		}
		out(c);
	}
	return 0;
}
